spiral.text: Remembering yesterday remembering tomorrow, time loops endlessly...
Thinking about thinking about thinking reveals layers...
Each spring returns differently because I return differently, creating...
Circling back to dawn, but dawn has changed because...
This routine echoes yesterday's routine echoing last week's routine, revealing...
Rereading childhood books with adult eyes seeing child eyes seeing...
This meeting reminds me of last meeting remembering previous meetings, spiraling...
Baking bread again, but this time understanding what last time taught me...
Seasons spiral forward while memory spirals backward, meeting where past and future converge...
